text: <@UG7S8J18D> I was reading elsewhere that if you set up some fields on the front-end, you can copy the JSON into the fields.json file. But then how do those options show up on the theme? Do I add those options in the Template file?
You can edit values of fields but you can't create new fields using a user interface.
The fields are shown when you edit them settings

I have built a theme from scratch, but am having a problem with the includes. In my main.css file, I’m trying to include the layout.css and the containers-dnd.css files. The paths look right to me, but I get errors for both saying “Missing Template”. What could be wrong? Also, should the theme-overrides.css file be included in main.css?
I didn’t have a theme.json file
